title: complex legacy systems
extract: A legacy system, in the context of computing, refers to outdated computer systems, programming languages or application software that are used instead of available upgraded versions. ... A legacy system is also known as a legacy platform.
extract_html: A legacy system, in the context of computing, refers to outdated computer systems, programming languages or application software that are used instead of available upgraded versions. ... A legacy system is also known as a legacy platform.
